title.en: A Prayer to the Glorious Master Jamgön Kongtrul Lodrö Thaye

text.en: Supreme illuminator of the Karma Kagyü teachings,
text.en-trans: karma kagyü tenpé nangjé chok

text.en: Powerful lord of speech, your wondrous qualities as vast as the ocean,
text.en-trans: ngak gi wangchuk yönten gya ché tso

text.en: The waves of your virtuous activity extending in all directions—
text.en-trans: gelek trinlé lab treng küntu khyab

text.en: Glorious and noble lama, at your feet I pray!1
text.en-trans: palden zangpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: 'Refutation', 'maintenance' and the universal science, together with their branches,2
text.en-trans: tsarchö jedzin kün shé yenlak ché

text.en: Your intelligence born of studying, contemplating and meditating upon
text.en-trans: chu trak rigpé né la tö sam dang

text.en: The ten sciences is without obstruction or hindrance—
text.en-trans: gompé lodrö chaktok dralwa yi

text.en: To you whose discernment knows no bounds or limitation, I pray!
text.en-trans: namchö tayé den la solwa deb

text.en: Cared for by Pema Wangchen3and the rest,
text.en-trans: pema wangchen sok kyi jesu zung

text.en: Holder of the awareness mantra of the compassionate Lord of Dance,4
text.en-trans: gar gyi wangchuk tukjé rik ngakchang

text.en: In your enlightened activity, you have the skill to discipline beings—
text.en-trans: trinlé drowa dulwé tsal ngawa

text.en: Glorious and supreme guru, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: palden lama chok la solwa deb

text.en: Born into the clan of Khyung,5with its line of accomplished masters,
text.en-trans: drub rikdzin pa khyung gi dung lé drol

text.en: Your karmic connection to pure Dharma, from past training, awoke,
text.en-trans: jangpé letro karpö chö la sé

text.en: And favourable conditions for the two domains6gathered spontaneously,
text.en-trans: khorlo nyi kyi tünkyen ngang gi tsok

text.en: To you who are so wondrous and amazing, I pray!
text.en-trans: ngotsar mé du jung la solwa deb

text.en: Renouncing harmful acts, together with their basis, you disciplined your mind,
text.en-trans: zhen nö zhir ché pongwé gyü dam shing

text.en: And applied yourself to the task of benefitting others, along with its underlying attitude,
text.en-trans: zhenpen zhir ché labpé né la zhol

text.en: Your perfect realization of the two phases utterly clear and apparent—
text.en-trans: rim nyi ngöntok chiryang salwa yi

text.en: To you, the Vajra-holder maintaining the three sets of vows, I pray!
text.en-trans: sumden dorjé dzinpar solwa deb

text.en: You relied upon several great guides, learned and accomplished leaders,
text.en-trans: khedrub depön yongdzin duma ten

text.en: And, with diligence and benevolence, entered the ocean of sūtra and mantra.
text.en-trans: do ngak gyatsor lhaksam tsönpé zhuk

text.en: To you, whose gift of jewel-like writings, advice and instructions,
text.en-trans: zhung dam mengak norbü kyé zang gi

text.en: Eradicates all spiritual poverty in fortunate disciples, I pray!
text.en-trans: kalden ulwa sel la solwa deb

text.en: In the vajra words of Orgyen, knower of the past, present and future,
text.en-trans: orgyen dü sum khyenpé dorjé ké

text.en: Which the universal sovereigns among siddhas revealed as treasures,
text.en-trans: ter jin drubpé khorlö gyur nam kyi

text.en: You were prophesied as an emanation of Vairocana and Vairotsana,
text.en-trans: namnang bai rotsa né namtrul du

text.en: To you who were invested with such authority, I pray!
text.en-trans: lungten ngasol dzé la solwa deb

text.en: The victor and his heir, Khyentse Wangpo and Chokgyur Lingpa,
text.en-trans: gyalwa yabsé chok ling khyentsé wang

text.en: In their supreme vision, recognized you as an incarnation
text.en-trans: chok zik nam kyi ta ra na ta dang

text.en: Of Jetsün Tārānātha and Minling Terchen Gyurme Dorje—
text.en-trans: gyurmé dorjé trulpar zhal zhé shing

text.en: To you who are praised as the supreme of guides, I pray!
text.en-trans: yongdzin chok tu kur la solwa deb

text.en: With pure perception, you uphold all Buddha's teachings impartially,
text.en-trans: gyalten rimé kyongwé daknang dang

text.en: And in your altruism, you seek to benefit all beings impartially,
text.en-trans: dro pen rimé drubpé lhaksam té

text.en: Your conduct is to address directly whatever occurs—
text.en-trans: gang jung tekar khyerwé chö tsul gyi

text.en: To you who leads the noblest life of liberation, I pray!
text.en-trans: dampé namtar dzin la solwa deb

text.en: In the isolated location of Tsadra Rinchen Drak,
text.en-trans: tsa dra rinchen drak gi wenné su

text.en: You planted the victory banner of accomplishment within a single life,
text.en-trans: tsé chik drubpé gyaltsen tsuk né su

text.en: And served the teachings with words transmitted in speech and text,
text.en-trans: ché tsom kabab ten la jawa dzé

text.en: To you who spontaneously benefits both self and other, I pray!
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhün gyi drub la solwa deb

text.en: The one who was so clearly praised in vajra statements,
text.en-trans: dorjé lung gi salwar ngakpé dön

text.en: Support for the Heruka's enlightened body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: heruka yi ku sung tuk kyi ten

text.en: To you, who for as long as the teachings remain in this world,
text.en-trans: tenpa jisi bardu dro pen gyi

text.en: Act to bring about the most precious benefit of beings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tsé su drubpar dzé la solwa deb

text.en: By the strength of our devotion and the power of unfailing interdependence,
text.en-trans: möpé tob dang tendrel lumé tü

text.en: May we never be separated from the glorious and supreme guru,
text.en-trans: palden lama chok dang mindral zhing

text.en: And within a single gathering in the great celestial citadel,
text.en-trans: khachö drongkhyer chenpor lhenchik tsok

text.en: May we attain the supreme level of Vajrasattva himself!
text.en-trans: dorjé sempé né chok tob gyur chik

text.en: As your tradition remains as steadfast and secure as a vajra,
text.en-trans: gang gi ringluk dorjé tar ten ching

text.en: And the profound and vast Five Treasures are proclaimed for evermore,
text.en-trans: zabgyé dzö nga taktu drokpa yi

text.en: May I and others follow this excellent path through to its very conclusion,
text.en-trans: dak sok lekpé lam kün tarchin ching

text.en: And, with our wishes spontaneously fulfilled, may virtue shine in splendour!
text.en-trans: samdön lhündrub gelek palbar shok
